name: Cold War 2
blurb: Pick a country, defeat your enemies, rapid fire miniature dolphins-of-war, and satisfy your urge to conquer the world!

rewards.reward: Comrade:\r\n============================= \r\nBe one of the first supporters of Cold War 2 and get a downloadable copy on your choice of either Windows, Linux, Mac, Wii U, 3DS or PS Vita. You'll also receive an additional copy on either IOS or Android. All this for an incredibly low price!

Soldier:\r\n=============================\r\nGet a downloadable copy of Cold War 2 on your choice of either Windows, Linux, Mac, Wii U, 3DS or PS Vita. You'll also receive an additional copy on either IOS or Android and a Kickstarter exclusive concept art book.

War Dolphin Tamer:\r\n=============================\r\nGet an exclusive and extremely powerful miniature dolphin throwing rapid fire machine gun. Yes, you read that right. It's as awesome as it sounds. You get the downloadable copy of Cold War 2 on your choice of either Windows, Linux, Mac, Wii U, 3DS or PS Vita. You'll also receive an additional copy on either IOS or Android and a Kickstarter exclusive concept art book.

Akimbo Tank Wielder:\r\n=============================\r\nGet an exclusive double tank gun that's somehow held up by a single soldier and also the notorious dolphin throwing machine gun. You get the downloadable copy of Cold War 2 on your choice of either Windows, Linux, Mac, Wii U, 3DS or PS Vita. You'll also receive an additional copy on either IOS or Android and a Kickstarter exclusive concept art book.

Bomb Specialist:\r\n=============================\r\nYour name will be in the game's credits and you'll get a digital honorary bomb specialist medal. Plus receive the exclusive double tank gun and dolphin throwing machine gun. You get the downloadable copy of Cold War 2 on your choice of either Windows, Linux, Mac, Wii U, 3DS or PS Vita. You'll also receive an additional copy on either IOS or Android and a Kickstarter exclusive concept art book.

Rambo Enthusiast:\r\n=============================\r\nWanna become Rambo? We know you do. You can either go do that in real life or just stick around on Kickstarter and get this early bird perk. Get the Kickstarter exclusive PHYSICAL edition of Cold War 2 on your choice of either Windows, Linux, Mac, Wii U, 3DS or PS Vita. You'll also receive an additional copy on either IOS or Android, a double tank gun, a dolphin throwing machine gun and a Kickstarter exclusive concept art book. Plus you'll be listed in the game's credits.

Seasoned War Vet:\r\n============================= \r\nGet the Kickstarter exclusive PHYSICAL edition of Cold War 2 on your choice of either Windows, Linux, Mac, Wii U, 3DS or PS Vita. You'll also receive an additional copy on either IOS or Android, a double tank gun, a dolphin throwing machine gun and a Kickstarter exclusive concept art book. Plus you'll be listed in the game's credits.

Unfazed Bomb Hugger:\r\n=============================\r\nHey man, bombs have feelings too, and it doesn't matter if they're North Korean or Russian. So get cozy and have instant access to the bomb hugger ability! Get the Kickstarter exclusive PHYSICAL edition of Cold War 2 on your choice of either Windows, Linux, Mac, Wii U, 3DS or PS Vita. You'll also receive an additional copy on either IOS or Android, a double tank gun, a dolphin throwing machine gun and a Kickstarter exclusive concept art book. Plus you'll be listed in the game's credits.

Blood Hungry Pacifist:\r\n=============================\r\nGet an early taste of Cold War 2 through closed beta access as well as a digital soundtrack. Receive the Kickstarter exclusive PHYSICAL edition of Cold War 2 on your choice of either Windows, Linux, Mac, Wii U, 3DS or PS Vita. You'll also receive an additional copy on either IOS or Android, a double tank gun, a dolphin throwing machine gun and a Kickstarter exclusive concept art book. Plus you'll be listed in the game's credits.

Quadruple Backstabbing Spy:\r\n=============================\r\nGet a pair of extremely high quality and possibly uranium enriched underwear with the Cold War 2 logo. And it's signed by everyone of our staff members because we care. Get the Kickstarter exclusive PHYSICAL edition of Cold War 2 on your choice of either Windows, Linux, Mac, Wii U, 3DS or PS Vita. You'll also receive an additional copy on either IOS or Android, a double tank gun, a dolphin throwing machine gun and a Kickstarter exclusive concept art book. Plus you'll be listed in the game's credits.

Conniving General:\r\n=============================\r\nGet a Cold War 2 branded general's hat, a CW2 medal of honor, awesome signed underpants and a colorful rainbow gas mask. Receive the Kickstarter exclusive PHYSICAL edition of Cold War 2 on your choice of either Windows, Linux, Mac, Wii U, 3DS or PS Vita. You'll also receive an additional copy on either IOS or Android, a double tank gun, a dolphin throwing machine gun and a Kickstarter exclusive concept art book. Plus you'll be listed in the game's credits.

Evil Mastermind:\r\n=============================\r\nGet a miniature throne of pure evilness, a CW2 medal of honor, awesome signed underpants and a colorful rainbow gas mask. Receive the Kickstarter exclusive PHYSICAL edition of Cold War 2 on your choice of either Windows, Linux, Mac, Wii U, 3DS or PS Vita. You'll also receive an additional copy on either IOS or Android, a double tank gun, a dolphin throwing machine gun and a Kickstarter exclusive concept art book. Plus you'll be listed in the game's credits.

Rich and Evil Mastermind:\r\n=============================\r\nChoose a country (it can be made up) to be incorporated into Cold War 2. Get signed artwork from our game, a miniature throne of pure evilness, a CW2 medal of honor, awesome signed underpants and a colorful rainbow gas mask. Receive the Kickstarter exclusive PHYSICAL edition of Cold War 2 on your choice of either Windows, Linux, Mac, Wii U, 3DS or PS Vita. You'll also receive an additional copy on either IOS or Android, a double tank gun, a dolphin throwing machine gun and a Kickstarter exclusive concept art book. Plus you'll be listed in the game's credits.

Chief President/King/Overlord of the World:\r\n=============================\r\nAttend our awesome launch party! You get exclusive access to the most powerful and biggest soldier in the game. It's the only soldier that represents more than one class -- you can choose between Overlord, President and King. Get signed artwork from our game, a miniature throne of pure evilness, a CW2 medal of honor, awesome signed underpants and a colorful rainbow gas mask. Receive the Kickstarter exclusive PHYSICAL edition of Cold War 2 on your choice of either Windows, Linux, Mac, Wii U, 3DS or PS Vita. You'll also receive an additional copy on either IOS or Android, a double tank gun, a dolphin throwing machine gun and a Kickstarter exclusive concept art book. Plus you'll be listed in the game's credits.
